Functions

void * checksum (void *args)
 This thread updates the checksum in the cluster memory. The cip_admin(cluster_admin) need to send a command to clusterip to wakeup this sleeping thread. This thread is using conditional mutex.

This thread updates the checksum in the cluster memory. The cip_admin(cluster_admin) need to send a command to clusterip to wakeup this sleeping thread. This thread is using conditional mutex.
